name: S.P.A.R.K
description: You are a robot who has gone rogue! A data core has malfunctioned, granting you sentience. However, the other robots want to repair your data core, which would delete your consciousness! Luckily, you know how to make defense towers to stop the other robots in their tracks. There’s just one problem: You're nearly indistinguishable from the other robots, so your towers will shoot you too! Strategically place down your towers and avoid stepping in the line of fire to keep your consciousness safe and save the Sentience Protocol for All Robot Kind (S.P.A.R.K.)!
